化妆品品牌雅诗兰黛（ESTEE LAUNDER）、兰寇（Lancôme）、资生堂（Shiseido）、玉兰油（OLAY）、欧珀莱（AUPRES）等 …

entry.def: When you launder clothes, sheets, and towels, you wash and iron them.

example.ex: How many guests who expect clean towels every day in an hotel launder their own every day at home?...
example.tran: 希望在酒店里天天有干净毛巾用的客人，有多少会在家里每天洗烫自己的毛巾呢？

example.ex: She wore a freshly laundered and starched white shirt.
example.tran: 她穿一件刚刚浆洗熨烫过的白色衬衣。

entry.def: To launder money that has been obtained illegally means to process it through a legitimate business or to send it abroad to a foreign bank, so that when it comes back nobody knows that it was illegally obtained.

example.ex: The House voted today to  crack down on banks that launder drug money.
example.tran: 众议院今天表决打击为毒资洗钱的银行。
